meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>stupid</kanji> <kanji>man</kanji> is a <vocabulary>groper</vocabulary>. I mean, not always. But it's probably fair to call a groper or <vocabulary>molester</vocabulary> a stupid man.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
